sources.title: Midnight Manhunt (1945) [Comedy] [Crime] [Mystery]
sources.description:
If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/0qDmXe | Midnight Manhunt begins with the shooting death of a master criminal who expires in a wax museum. Reporter Sue Gallagher (Ann Savage) is first on the scene, but she is soon in competition with her boyfriend, fellow reporter Pete Willis (William Gargan). The killer traps Sue in the wax museum when he returns there looking for the body. Leo Gorcey plays the caretaker of the wax museum.

---

Directed by William C. Thomas, produced by Maxwell Shane, written by David Lang, starring William Gargan as Pete Willis, Ann Savage as Sue Gallagher, Leo Gorcey as Clutch Tracy, George Zucco as Jelke, Paul Hurst as Murphy, Don Beddoe as Det. Lt. Max Hurley, Charles Halton as Henry Miggs, George E. Stone as Joe Wells, Robert Barron as Cop with Hurley, Edgar Dearing as Police Desk Sergeant, Paul Harvey as Mr. McAndrews (Night Editor) and Ben Welden as Hotel Manager.

---

Source: "Midnight Manhunt" Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.. 3 January 2013. Web. 23 December  2013. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Midnight_Manhunt.

If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/0qDmXe

sources.title: Midnight Manhunt
sources.description: Stolen diamonds are at the heart of a game of body, body, who's got the body played by two reporters, a crook, two employees of a wax museum, and the police. Stars: William Gargan, Ann Savage, Leo Gorcey, George Zucco, Paul Hurst, Don Beddoe, Charles Halton, and George E. Stone IMDb Page The 676MB MPEG4 file was derived from the 3GB MPEG2 found on this page . This movie can also be found here .

sources.title: Midnight Manhunt
sources.description: Reporter Sue Gallagher (Ann Savage from Detour) finds an infamous gangster's corpse in a wax museum. Her desire for a scoop is hindered by a meddling rival (William Gargan), the museum's goofy maintenance man (Leo Gorcey), and the ruthless killer (B-horror king George Zucco).

sources.title: Midnight Manhunt (1945)
sources.description: Two reporters search for a missing body in a wax museum. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/midnight-manhunt-1945/

sources.title: Midnight Manhunt (1945) ANN SAVAGE
sources.description:
Stars: Ann Savage, William Gargan, Leo Gorcey
Director: William C. Thomas

A gangster is shot in his hotel room and manages to make his way to a wax museum where he dies. Two rival reporters—who happen to be dating—compete to break the case, before the killer discovers the body!

sources.title: Midnight Manhunt (1945) Ann Savage & Leo Gorcey | Comedy, Crime, Mystery Film
sources.description:
A WEIRD, WHACKY “WHO-DUN-IT” IN A WAX MUSEUM!
Two reporters search for a missing body in a wax museum.

Director: William C. Thomas
Writer:  David Lang
Stars:  William Gargan, Ann Savage, Leo Gorcey & George Zucco
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Crime, Mystery

sources.title: Midnight Manhunt (1945; smallest download)
sources.description: Actors: William Gargan; George Zucco; Leo Gorcey; Ann Savage; Don Beddoe; Charles Halton; Paul Hurst Writer: David Lang Runtime: 1:02:28 The Matroska (.mkv) file is the smallest download for this movie on the Archive (59.3 MB). Audacity was used to reduce noise. You've heard of a double negative? Here's a triple: "Do you not never read no newspapers?"

metadata.Plot: In a cheap hotel room in New York City Jelke shoots gangster Joe Wells, takes a package from his pocket and flees.Wells staggers into an alley. On her way to her apartment above a wax museum, Sue Gallagher, a reporter for the Chronicle, finds Wells' body and hides his corpse among the wax-figures in the museum and calls her paper to send a photographer so she can get a scoop on the killing of Wells, who had a $5,000 reward for his capture, dead or alive. Meanwhile, Henry Miggs, the museum owner find the body and is ready to call the police but his handyman, Clutch Tracy tells him to conceal it and avoid suspicion. From this point on it is a game of where-is-the-body....and the stolen South American diamonds Wells was carrying.
metadata.Actors: William Gargan, Ann Savage, Leo Gorcey
